mapper.select: SELECT r.id, u.nickname, u.tel, r.start_date, r.end_date, r.start_time, r.end_time, h.name, l.location, l.location_info, r.rent_place_status FROM rent_place_reservation_tb AS r JOIN hole_tb AS h ON r.hole_id = h.id JOIN location_tb AS l ON r.location_id = l.id LEFT JOIN user_tb AS u ON u.id = r.user_id ORDER BY r.rent_place_status ASC, r.id DESC
